author: ikrav
body: This PR contains EGM certified cut-based and MVA electron IDs tuned on 80X samples. They are intended to be used on 2016 data. The electron MVA contains the HZZ MVA used for ICHEP16 and the presently recommended general purpose MVA tuned for better performance given features of a more complete 2016 dataset.
title: EGM-certified electron IDs for 2016 data: cut-based and MVA
